question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. grey motorcycle
B. green fruits
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The green fruits are on the far left side of the road, near the curb, while the grey motorcycle is in the foreground, closer to the viewer, making the fruits clearly further away in 3D space.
